data.title: Home and Exile: Lewis Nkosi by Nkosi, Lewis: Good Paperback (1965) First Edition.
data.meta_description: First Edition. - Paperback - Longmans - 1965 - Condition: Good - The paperback wraps of this book are bent on both corners, wear on the edges and on the spine, shelf wear on the front and rear covers. There is a name stamp on the inside cover and a pen name on the half title page. All orders packed with care, dust jackets protected by Brodart sleeve, independent bookseller since 2011 - Home and Exile: Lewis Nkosi
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We guarantee the condition of every book as it's described on the Abebooks web sites. If you're dissatisfied with your purchase (Incorrect Book/Not as Described/Damaged) or if the order hasn't arrived, you're eligible for a refund within 30 days of the estimated delivery date. If you've changed your mind about a book that you've ordered, please use the Ask bookseller a question link to contact us and we'll respond within 2 business days.
